channel.title: I cant get on my server but other people can
channel.description: Everytime I try to log on I get error connecting to server ill evenutally be able to login but it will take awhile. Other people are on it and stuff so whats the problem and how do I fix it

item.title: I cant get on my server but other people can
item.dc:creator: @bmw981 bmw981
item.description:
@bmw981 wrote:

cocoa:

you guys are all idiots. You can’t log onto your server with your no-ip or just normal ip address. For you to log in you would need to use 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 as your ip but everyone uses your ip or the no-ip.

dude… yeah you can, i do it all the time to make sure my no-ip is working.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get on my server but other people can

item.title: I cant get on my server but other people can
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

Well if you try to connect to your own pc with ur no-ip it doesnt work.
It should work easily when you leave the server thing blank or use 127.0.0.1 or localhost

item.title: I cant get on my server but other people can
item.dc:creator: @bmw981 bmw981
item.description:
@bmw981 wrote:

except he said he gets on eventually…

maybe your computer isn’t fast enough to host + log on. Because i know when my computer’s laggy it always says “error blah blah blah.”

so maybe if you have another computer you could just log onto your server using your IP… that’s what i do sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: I cant get on my server but other people can
item.dc:creator: @steveolicious steveolicious
item.description:
@steveolicious wrote:

Well if YOUR running the runserver.bat or whatever, you should be able to connect.
Try connecting just through localhost (leave the ip blank). But still if others can get through through direct ip or no-ip, you should be able to.
